name: Out Of Its Element
description:
In Out Of Its Element you play as a wand forgotten by its wizard and left to fight for itself.

Use the mouse to move, W A D to create spells and left click to cast them. (W=fire, A=water, D=earth)

Made for the Mini Jam 14 - Elements (limitation: no humans) - using Love2D.

16x16 Dungeon Tileset by 0x72
